resources.string: To calibrate sensitivity you will need a steady sound source and a calibrated SPL meter. Turn on the sound source and the reference meter. Adjust the sensitivity until the two dB readings match. When satisfied, press SET CALIBRATION to save.

"To measure sound pressure level, you will need a steady sound source and a calibrated SLM, the calibration needs to be done prior to the measurement. Turn on the sound source and press OFF to monitor and measure SPL. "

Each measurement will take 10 seconds, the button will be automatically toggled off when a measurement is finished. Once 5 different locations for the microphone is measured, press the "FINISH" button.
Type in the name of the measurement
Enter the dimensions of the receiving room.
Surface area of the wall in m^2
Stai visualizzando l\'interfaccia semplice, puoi passare a quella Avanzata nelle impostazioni

"SuperAcoustics is an application developed to measure the sound reduction index of a wall, floor, ceiling or other building component. \nIn order to complete succesful measurements, your android phone must first be calibrated with the use of professional acoustics equipment. \nBelow you will find recommendations on how to calibrate your smartphone for the best results. "

The idea with this calibration is that it only needs to be done before you do your first measurement with your phone. After that the settings you input are saved in your phone and there is no need to update it for future measurements. It is still possible to change the settings after initial calibration if you wish to do so.

To calibrate measurements for Sound Pressure Level, it is recommended to test measuring pink noise at varying noise levels alongside a sound level meter. Do this in order to find the combination of sensitivity correction, audio source and Windowing that gives you the best result.

To calibrate measurements for background noise, it is recommended to do a number of different measurements in various quiet rooms next to a sound level meter. Since the settings will not always be the same as they are for sound pressure level depending on your smartphone. These settings are saved seperately from that of the settings for sound pressure level.
